title: Roasted beetroot and carrot with warm goats' cheese cakes

ingredients.item: 2 x 100g essential Waitrose English goats’ cheese
130g bag rocket, watercress and spinach salad
4 tbsp pecans or almonds, toasted and chopped

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. On a baking tray, drizzle the beetroot and carrots with 1 tbsp oil; season. Cover with foil; roast for 15 minutes, then 10-15 minutes without foil, until golden.

Meanwhile, place the egg and breadcrumbs in separate bowls. Slice the goats’ cheeses in half widthways to make 4 small rounds. Dip the cheese rounds in the egg and cover well in the breadcrumbs, then chill in the freezer for 15 minutes.

Put all the dressing ingredients in a screw-top jar; season. Seal, shake well and set aside. Heat the remaining 1 tbsp olive oil in a pan and fry the chilled goats’ cheese for about 1 minute on each side, until golden and starting to melt and become gooey.
Divide the salad between 4 plates, top with the vegetables, goats’ cheese and nuts, and drizzle with the dressing.
